channel.title: Credit Slips on PrestaShop Tests
channel.description: Recent content in Credit Slips on PrestaShop Tests

item.title: Create Filter Credit Slips
item.description: Preconditions Having a shop installed locally Go to the BO and connect with an admin account Steps Step Description Expected result Open the FO Home page is displayed successfully Add the first product to the cart The cart page is opened There is one product in the cart Click on “Proceed to checkout” button The purchase form is displayed correctly Sign in with the default account “pub@prestashop.

item.title: Generate Credit Slips By Date
item.description: Preconditions Having a shop installed locally Go to the BO and connect with an admin account Steps Step Description Expected result Open the FO page The home page is opened successfully Add the first product to the cart There is one product in the cart Click on “Proceed to checkout” button The purchase form is displayed correctly Sign in with the default account “pub@prestashop.

item.title: Credit Slip Options
item.description: Preconditions Having a shop installed locally Go to the BO and connect with an admin account Steps Step Description Expected result Go to “Orders > Credit slips” page Credit slips page is displayed successfully Set the new prefix and save the form The validation message is displayed successfully “Update successful” Go to “Orders > Orders” page Orders page is displayed successfully Open the first order page Order page is displayed successfully Change the order status to “Shipped” The status is changed successfully
